Uses of Interface
org.microbean.helm.maven.ReleaseDiscoveryListener

    • Uses of ReleaseDiscoveryListener in org.microbean.helm.maven

      Classes in org.microbean.helm.maven that implement ReleaseDiscoveryListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractReleaseDiscoveryListener
      A ReleaseDiscoveryListener that logs the Tiller.ListReleasesResponseOrBuilder associated with a ReleaseDiscoveryEvent.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven that return ReleaseDiscoveryListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReleaseDiscoveryListener[] ListReleasesMojo.getReleaseDiscoveryListeners()
      Invokes the ListReleasesMojo.getReleaseDiscoveryListenersList() method and converts its return value to an array.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven that return types with arguments of type ReleaseDiscoveryListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ReleaseDiscoveryListener> ListReleasesMojo.getReleaseDiscoveryListenersList()
      Returns the List of ReleaseDiscoveryListeners whose elements will be notified when a release is retrieved.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven with parameters of type ReleaseDiscoveryListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ListReleasesMojo.addReleaseDiscoveryListener(ReleaseDiscoveryListener listener)
      Adds a ReleaseDiscoveryListener that will be notified when a release is retrieved
      void ListReleasesMojo.removeReleaseDiscoveryListener(ReleaseDiscoveryListener listener)
      Removes a ReleaseDiscoveryListener from this GetHistoryMojo.
      Method parameters in org.microbean.helm.maven with type arguments of type ReleaseDiscoveryListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ListReleasesMojo.setReleaseDiscoveryListenersList(List<ReleaseDiscoveryListener> releaseDiscoveryListeners)
      Installs the List of ReleaseDiscoveryListeners whose elements will be notified when a release is retrieved.
